name: Exotic Auto Collection
description: E-commerce style site for user search and look for rare, hard to find exotic vehicles. If they find something they like, they can then apply for financing or outright purchase the vehicle.

name: Travel Mobile App
description: This app was built using React for the front end and Express for the backend. As a group we were assigned a design pattern and layout of the case study to follow for our build. We did make a few changes to the app based on the requirements given to us by our instructors, but otherwise we crushed the assignment.

name: My Jounreys - blog
description: My Journeys allow a user to read and follow along on and learn about my journey into the world of software development.

name: Code Dangerously
description: A website that I built while reading through the Learn Enough to Be Dangerous books.

name: Mars Website - Responsive exercise
description: An exercise on adding and adjusting the CSS styles for a fully responsive design for websites.

name: Dungeon Log
description: An iOS app that I built to track a players campaigns for adventure board games.

name: jQuery Project
description: This project was all about working with jQuery and manipulating the DOM.

name: To Be Continued...
description: The cycle of learning and growing mentally and physically is never over.
